vision.notes: House centipedes are found in dimly lit areas, suggesting functional vision, though its capabilities are unknown. Inferred from behavior of Scutigera coleoptrata and Allothereua maculata.

mechanoreception.notes: Centipedes generally rely on mechanoreception for detecting vibrations and touch. Likely used for navigation and prey detection. Inferred from general centipede biology and behavior of Allothereua bidenticulata.

chemoreception.notes: Likely uses chemoreception to locate prey and navigate. Inferred from general centipede biology and habitat preferences of Scutigera coleoptrata.
